list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a localized physical condition in which part of the body becomes reddened, swollen, hot, and often painful, especially as a reaction to injury or infection.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: chronic inflammation of the nasal cavities
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Viêm dữ liệu mãn tính của sâu răng mũi
